jump_scares.spoiler: A sudden bang on the window startles Manuel and Altair
Manuel turns around with the camera, and Altair is standing right in front of him
Manuel turns the camera down from the ceiling and spots Altair standing in front of him with her back turned
While unresponsively sitting on a chair and looking down, Altair suddenly grabs the camera as Manuel points it at her
A door suddenly slams shut on its own
While lying on the floor, Altair suddenly springs upwards and begins to scream
The ceiling lamp suddenly explodes
While Altair plays with something bloody in her hands, an inhuman hand suddenly reaches and grabs her
Something appears to move in front of the camera which is filming the two astronauts on the moon and there is a loud burst of static
The camera zooms in on Nate, who is snoring, he suddenly opens his eyes and yells (as a joke)
Ben uses his camera to light up the crater, suddenly the camera flash illuminates the corpse of one of the Russian cosmonauts
The dead cosmonauts appears to jerk violently as Ben looks through his suit
There is several loud bangs and the camera that is viewing the Russian lander suddenly tips over
Nate suddenly shatters the rock with a hammer as Ben examines it
Nate, who appears to be sleeping, suddenly grabs Ben’s arm
Nate is pulled into the crater
Nate bangs on the window of the lander just as Ben is about to launch
Nate’s head explodes
A torch is briefly shone on a figure before the camera footage cuts out
A loud bang startles James in his tent
Lisa suddenly bursts into James’ tent
There is a burst of static from the walkie-talkie during a quiet scene
Lane suddenly appears in front of Talia and James
Something appears to pull Peter away and the camera footage cuts out
Ashley suddenly pulls Lisa’s hand away from the camera
James startles Lisa
The camera gradually approaches the back of Talia’s head and she suddenly screams
A branch snaps and a hysterical Talia appears in front of James
A tent flies into the air
An unseen force pulls Ashley out of the tree
A flash of lightning illuminates the room and a woman can briefly be seen watching James
A disheveled Lane suddenly appears in front of Lisa
Lane runs at Lisa while screaming
There are several loud whooshing noises
Lane sees a tall thin figure coming towards her in a hallway
James runs into Lisa
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, the camera quickly pans to show Peeping Tom’s feet stepping in front of Feldman
As Feldman looks up, Peeping Tom suddenly jumps up right in front of the camera
Aaron is startled by Josef while in his car
Josef surfaces from under the water in the bathtub
Aaron pulls back a curtain and is startled by a scary mask
Josef jumps out from behind a boulder and scares Aaron
Josef jumps out of a doorway and scares Aaron as he is entering the house
Josef wakes up suddenly
There is a noise
Josef starts speaking behind Aaron
Aaron is startled by a loud noise while he is in bed
Josef appears in front of the camera and lets out a scream. [Video]
A cup on the table suddenly moves on its own
As Graham reaches for the cup it suddenly flies off the table
The pictures on the wall suddenly fall off on their own
Erin moves to reveal a ghost woman standing right behind her
As the vlogger approaches a hole in a bricked up wall to investigate a noise, a bird suddenly flies out
Erin screams at something and the camera rotates to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind Graham
As the cameraman approaches a doll it suddenly jumps out at him
Graham begins to nudge the sheets on the floor with his foot when the sheets suddenly fly up in the figure of the ghost woman
As Graham approaches a room, the ghost woman becomes visible in the corner, which startles him
Graham slowly moves into the room when the ghost woman suddenly runs out from behind the corner and towards the camera
The ghost woman’s hands suddenly break out of the wall and grab Graham
Graham points the camera at the door which suddenly slams on its own
Graham opens the door to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind it as she lunges out at him
Graham turns around and the ghost woman is right behind him
A dog barks during a tense scene
Zach, who appears to be asleep, suddenly jumps out of bed to scare Sam
During what appears to be some sort of ritual, there is a sudden bright light accompanied by a high pitched noise
Sam grabs Zach’s wrist
There is a sudden cut to a dog barking
The sound of a door being pushed open during a tense scene may startle some viewers
Sam suddenly appears in front of the camera screaming “get out”. [Video]
Father Thomas suddenly yells at Zach
A girl is pulled into the air by a supernatural force
Sam screams and the door slams shut. A few seconds later the door is blasted off it’s hinges
Sam screams and the furniture lifts off the ground
Sam screams once more and the pictures on the wall fly into the opposite wall
Sam tilts her neck causing Zach to go flying backwards
Will turns on the camera light and a monster is standing right in front of him
There is suddenly a loud bang in the middle of a conversation
Adam grabs his boot from the grave and stands up to reveal Dekker standing right behind him
While Adam and Dekker are arguing, Will points the camera downwards and a monster runs straight at him
There is suddenly an incredibly loud screech that wakes up Adam and his wife
A bloody man runs towards the camera. Footage from original film
A person appears in the mirror
A bloody man is on the ceiling. Footage from the original film
A man bloody man jumps out of the bathtub. Footage from original film
The spirit board arrow jump out of their hands
A loud bang
The furniture in the room gets flipped over
Jerry is pulled out the window
A loud noise is heard
A childs face distorts and screams
A door flies open
A loud noise is heard
The security guard wakes up
A man with a distorted face crashes through the window
A jet of steam busts from a pipe
A man runs at the thermal camera
A child with a distorted face runs towards the camera in the vent
Sean jumps
A loud bang is heard
A light suddenly switches on
A ghostly women jumps into view
The door slams shut
There is a sudden loud noise and the camera goes fuzzy
Sasha’s hair gets lifted from behind
T.C. gets pushed down the stairs
A bed frame lifts off the ground
A girl runs through the hallway
The film crew approach a girl in the corner of a room when she spins around and screams
A hand breaks through the door behind Sasha and grabs her
Someone jumps out of a bath tub full of blood and drags in T.C
Lance finds a tongue in the corner of the room, looks up, and sees a ghost on the roof
A figure runs at Lance in the hallway
Lance spins around to see a group of doctors working on a patient. Suddenly one jumps up close to Lance and screams

movies.title: Hell House LLC II: The Abaddon Hotel

jump_scares.spoiler: A woman with pale eyes is seen in a dark basement
The camera pans across to find one of the mannequins sitting at a table is now standing up facing the camera
A bloody woman with pale eyes appears in front of the camera. After holding on the shot for several seconds, the camera zooms in on her eyes
A clown mannequin’s arm and head moves
A door slams shut
A woman with pale eyes blinks, and a female screams
A wall suddenly explodes, revealing a red portal
The camera image glitches with an image of a clown’s face
A bloody girl with yellow eyes and black lips appears in front of the camera
A man playing piano turns to reveal a bloody gash where his eye should be
A knock is heard at Seylan’s door, which is revealed to just be a late delivery
Jemma suddenly screams loudly as she claims to have felt something touch her neck
Haley is suddenly dragged backwards in her chair
A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters
A warbling sound is heard as the lights in everyone’s rooms begin to flicker
Caroline becomes visible through her virtual background as she appears to fall towards the webcam, knocking the laptop over
Emma’s camera pans down and a floating face filter is seen
Emma’s cabinet doors burst open
Alan’s body falls to the floor behind Radina
Caroline once again becomes visible through her virtual background as she starts repeatedly slamming her head
Haley’s chair gets pulled away
A mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view
Another mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view as loud screaming is heard
Thudding is heard in the distance
Teddy’s flashlight explodes
A scream is heard as another explosion occurs, blowing Teddy backwards
Emma screams loudly after she throws a blanket and it lands in mid-air
A window shatters off-screen as Jemma breaks into Haley’s house
Jemma’s hand reaches for the camera
Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit
The possessed woman suddenly sprouts wings and begins to screech
Sarah turns around and a kid suddenly runs at her and tackles her
There is a sudden loud roar and Sarah quickly turns around to see a dog barking at her
Sarah turns around and sees Kevin right in front of her face, startling her
Omar suddenly jumps into frame from the side to scare Sarah
A loud cat video suddenly starts to play on screen as Sarah’s glasses glitch out
Another loud cat video suddenly plays on screen
Rachel jumps at Sarah to scare her as a joke
Several loud fighter jets suddenly fly above Sarah, startling her
There is a sudden loud growl which startles everyone
Sarah peeks out from under the desk and a demon screeches and tackles her
As Sarah slowly peeks around the corner, David quickly passes in front of her on a bike
As the group is running, a corpse falls from the sky in front of them
As the camera begins to zoom out, Sarah sees a demon standing right in front of her and screaming
The demon standing still in the alleyway suddenly begins to run at the group
Sarah shines the light on a suit of armor, startling her
A sudden loud earthquake causes startles the group
As Sarah reaches to touches Rachel’s shoulder, she quickly turns around and attacks Sarah
Sarah quickly turns around and sees several screeching demons walking towards the group
Sarah turns around and Omar’s dad is standing right in front of the camera
Sarah turns on a light and there is a demon standing right in front of her, causing her to gasp
The camera begins to glitch out and quickly zooms on the demon
Sarah shines the light on the demon, who begins to screech
After Marika begins to groan and enters some sort of trance, several birds slam into the window
After seeing some camera footage, Hori suddenly becomes very agitated
Some birds fly out at Kobayashi as he opens a sliding door
A sudden cut from a quiet scene where Kana is sleeping to an earlier scene where Hori is screaming may startle some viewers
A loud buzzing noise wakes everyone up
Britton pulls the front door curtain, and a wolf-like creature jumps at the window
Cameron walks towards the corner of the attic and a bat flies out at him
The lights turn back on and a tall monster is standing right in front of the camera
The wolf creature walks away as Cameron gets closer to the car window. Suddenly, it runs back to the car and hits it
An isopod crawls out of a fish
A swimmer is pulled under water
Accompanied by a high pitched screeching noise, the diver is attacked by an isopod
Donna screams as some blood falls on her
An apparently dead man’s eyeball suddenly moves
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers (this is followed by a second gunshot a few seconds later)
A car crashes into the mayor’s vehicle
Stephanie is about to start the cop car when a diseased person jumps up from the back seat and grabs her. [Video]
The scene abruptly cuts from Jim typing to a very loud gunshot
A previously quiet scene is interrupted by high pitched static
A man wearing a scary mask appears in front of the camera (accompanied by a sound effect)
Michael suddenly jolts awake
The medium suddenly grabs Michael and there is a burst of static
Michael suddenly screams as the footage distorts and we get another burst of static
The footage cuts to a close up of a stereo accompanied by a loud static noise
During Michael’s hypnotism, everything goes quiet briefly before Michael suddenly appears standing directly in front of the camera
A bird flies into the window
Ellie’s toy makes a noise from behind Michael
A trashcan falls over making a loud noise
Michael in the television footage suddenly turns and looks at the real Michael and once again this is accompanied by a static sound effect
Michael opens a drawer to reveal a bloodied knife and a static sound effect plays once more
Something sparks in the background after Michael says “Why are you doing this?
The book Michael is reading from is suddenly thrown away by an unseen force
Michael violently spasms several times as he lies handcuffed to the bed
As Michael reaches for the phone of the floor, a bloodied hand hangs down from the ceiling
Michael headbutts the mirror
The plug holding the hairdryer explodes
After Michael jumps out of the house, we see Michael lying motionless on the ground for several seconds before we hear a thudding noise and the camera moves slightly
As Samantha bends down to pick up the coin, a car slams into her
Doris crawls around the corner and snarls at Tyler
Doris runs past the door as Tyler looks out
Rebecca bursts through a door to scare Tyler
Doris pops up in front of the camera and snarls
Doris bangs hard on the children’s bedroom door
Doris bangs on the window
Doris appears in front of the camera
Doris’s hand comes up from underneath the bed and she laughs maniacally
The straw person falls from the roof
Alexey is pulled into the air
The ground reveals a face that screams
Viktoria is knocked down
Viktoria turns towards the camera
Tangles’ audio cable is ripped away
The frozen image of the creatures face appears on the camera footage
The guard is dragged out of sight around a corner by an unseen creature
As Peter climbs through a small opening, he is suddenly pulled away by the creature
The creature rushes at the camera
The creature that Natasha is following turns around and breaks the camera
There is a short scream and the webcam, which was focused on Val, suddenly falls to the ground
There is a loud thud and the webcam moves to Val’s motionless body lying on the ground
There are several seconds of broken video from Ken’s webcam which show a distressed Ken being slammed into the computer desk and putting his hands and face in a blender
Jess’s webcam shows a brief image of her crouching on the bathroom floor screaming. Several seconds later the webcam shows Jess with a hair straightener in her mouth
Hands reach down and close the laptop screen, accompanied by a loud NO!, a few seconds later the ghost of Laura lunges at the screen
Hank suddenly shouts “I’m sorry.” While not a jump scare, it is sudden and extremely loud, enough to clip the microphone
Emma puts the camera down and as she moves out of the center point, the Slenderman is revealed to be standing right behind her
As Emma backs out of the school driveway, Chase points the camera at the Slenderman standing behind the building, followed by the camera glitching and an extremely loud yell
Hank turns around to look at Danny and the Slenderman is standing right behind him
A stack of hay suddenly falls in front of Emma
Emma turns around and the Slenderman is standing behind her
Chase shines the phone’s flashlight on the Slenderman
Kyle suddenly fires the gun
All of the screens suddenly turn into a close-up of the Slenderman
